prepare:
(:action prepare_area ; prepare the planting area
    :parameters (?p - player ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (not (prepared ?l)))
    :effect (prepared ?l)
)
take:
(:action take_cutting ; take a cutting from the rose bush
    :parameters (?p - player ?bush - rose_bush ?cutting - clipping)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?bush) (attached ?cutting ?bush))
    :effect (and (not (attached ?cutting ?bush)) (cut ?cutting))
)
dip:
(:action dip_in_hormide ; dip the cutting in rooting hormone
    :parameters (?p - player ?cutting - clipping ?hormone - rooting_hormone)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?cutting) (cut ?cutting) (moistened ?cutting) (pure ?cutting))
    :effect (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?cutting)
)
plant:
(:action plant_cutting ; plant the cutting
    :parameters (?p - player ?cutting - clipping ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?cutting) (dipped_into_rooting_hormone ?cutting) (prepared ?l))
    :effect (planted ?cutting ?l)
)
```

Explanation:
- `prepare_area`: Prepares the area where the cutting will be planted.
- `take_cutting`: Takes a cutting from the rose bush.
- `dip_in_hormide`: Dips the moistened cutting into rooting hormone.
- `plant_cutting`: Plants the prepared cutting into the prepared area.
